targets.expr:
topk(200,(
   sum(last_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_elapsed_time_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_elapsed_time_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]))
    by (alias, instance, job, sql_id, plan_hash_value, sql_text)
))

topk(200,(
   sum(last_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_cpu_time_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_cpu_time_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]))
    by (alias, instance, job, sql_id, plan_hash_value, sql_text)
))

topk(200,(
   sum(last_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_executions_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_executions_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]))
    by (alias, instance, job, sql_id, plan_hash_value, sql_text)
))

topk(200,(
   sum(last_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_buffer_gets_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]) -
       min_over_time(oracledb_ora_top_cpu_sqls_buffer_gets_total{alias=~"$alias"}[$__range]))
    by (alias, instance, job, sql_id, plan_hash_value, sql_text)
))
